title: Bloomberg Markets: Morgan on Cloud Infrastructure as a Service
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Morgan on Cloud Infrastructure as a Service
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Daniel Morgan Vice President and Senior Portfolio Manager Synovus Trust Company Discussing companies that focus on cloud infrastructure as a service, and which ones to invest in.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
